title: Sabre Brazil receives Great Place To Work award among top 10 IT employersTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Sabre Brazil receives Great Place To Work award among top 10 IT employers Published on : Saturday, August 15, 2015
Recently the Great Place to Work Institute (GPTW) held an award ceremony to recognize the top 100 IT companies to work for in Brazil, and once again, Sabre has been recognized among the top 10 employers with excellence in workspace and career building opportunities.
Results are based from an assessment conducted by the international consultancy HR firm, Great Place To Work, which surveyed more than 200,000 employees in 250 participating companies with operations in the information technology space.
Sabre first participated in the survey in 2006 and has continued to show progress in their ranking.
Colleagues and executives from Sabre Brazil, proud to be part of the 8th Best Company to work for in Brazil
“We are proud to be listed and recognized among the best technology companies in Brazil and it’s a testament to our team dedication to customers and industry partners,” said Luiz Ambar, vice president of Sabre in Brazil and southern Latin America. “This award also cements our commitment to fostering a workplace that encourages creative and innovative thinking, and delivering world-class service to our agency, airline, hotel and corporate customers.”
Established in São Paulo in 1996 as the main office in Brazil, Sabre is well known for its experienced staff who provides innovative technology solutions across the travel industry.
